deepsubmergence.steelhead.name: Steelhead Trout
deepsubmergence.steelhead.desc: A writhing fish with metal plating bolted to its face. Blood or rust drips from it, you cannot tell which.
deepsubmergence.electriceel.name: Electric Eel
deepsubmergence.electriceel.desc: The pain in the fish's eyes is reflected over and over in the strange mirrored balls grafted to its body.
deepsubmergence.netsquid.name: Lattice Squid
deepsubmergence.netsquid.desc: At first it appears to be an ordinary squid tangled in a net. Closer inspection reveals meticulous stitching of the steel cable into the squid's flesh.
deepsubmergence.torpedofish.name: Torpedo Fish
deepsubmergence.torpedofish.desc: A sickening pun manifest. It seems to be ticking.
deepsubmergence.shreddershark.name: Shredder Shark
deepsubmergence.shreddershark.desc: A glinting sharp apparatus, embedded cruelly into a shark. Oddly, it smells faintly of... peaches?
deepsubmergence.needlefish.name: Giant Needlefish
deepsubmergence.needlefish.desc: The strange liquid inside the syringe oozes out, slowly. Be careful not to touch it.
deepsubmergence.boltfish.name: Bolt Fish
deepsubmergence.boltfish.desc: A shape meant for clamping and holding tight, no matter the depth.
deepsubmergence.ironlungfish.name: Iron Lungfish
deepsubmergence.ironlungfish.desc: Bleeding so profusely that it stains the ocean as it swims. A veritable sea of blood.
deepsubmergence.lampcrab.name: Lamp Crab
deepsubmergence.lampcrab.desc: It seems cruel to make such a tasty ocean morsel so visible.
deepsubmergence.shoal.name: Hungering Shoal
deepsubmergence.shoal.desc: It moves as one, thinks as one, and eats as many.
deepsubmergence.trenchwhale.name: Flayed Whale
deepsubmergence.trenchwhale.desc: Although the machinery continues to grind, the animal is long dead. May as well give it some dignity in death.
deepsubmergence.floodwater.name: Flooding Water
deepsubmergence.floodwater.desc: A minor annoyance. Water is automatically dried when docking, or can be drained while at sea using Pumps.
deepsubmergence.pumptier1.name: Low-Quality Pump
deepsubmergence.pumptier2.name: Straining Pump
deepsubmergence.pumptier2.desc: Removes flooding water at a medium rate
deepsubmergence.pumptier3.name: Pressurized Pump
deepsubmergence.pressurevesseltier1.name: Thin Pressure Vessel
deepsubmergence.pressurevesseltier1.desc: Adds a small amount of time to how long you can remain submerged.
deepsubmergence.pressurevesseltier2.name: Thick Pressure Vessel
deepsubmergence.pressurevesseltier2.desc: Adds a reasonable amount of time to how long you can remain submerged.
deepsubmergence.pressurevesseltier3.name: Double-Hulled Pressure Vessel
deepsubmergence.pressurevesseltier3.desc: Adds a good deal of time to how long you can remain submerged.
deepsubmergence.seabase.name: Sea Base
deepsubmergence.diver.title: Hollow Diver
deepsubmergence.quest0dialogue0: Ah... what ill fate dragged you to these depths, to this... place?
deepsubmergence.quest0dialogue1: But, no matter. I need something from you. A favor, if you will.
deepsubmergence.quest0dialogue2: I was stationed here, once, until some of my research... slipped away.
deepsubmergence.quest0dialogue3: There was a small bolting fish, a squid caught in a net, and a shoal... so many hungry mouths.
deepsubmergence.quest0dialogue4: Don’t fret. They won't rot. They never rot.
deepsubmergence.quest0dialogue5: Keep them... close... until you bring them to me. Return here when you have them all... and... everything will be...
deepsubmergence.quest1dialogue0: That's... that's them. You-you found them. But how did...?
deepsubmergence.quest1dialogue1: When they... when they sent me down here, I was... elated. So elated. They'd given me... everything I wanted
deepsubmergence.quest1dialogue2: Free reign... to test... to discover... to create...
deepsubmergence.quest1dialogue3: Take this. Here. Blueprints... for reinforcing your hull. For... for pushing out the water. The water that seeps in when you dive too deep.
deepsubmergence.quest1dialogue4: But... but this isn’t everything. No... no, there’s more. More out there...
deepsubmergence.quest1dialogue5: A wriggling shock... a glowing crawler... a bleeding slice of iron... and a needle’s tip. So sharp... so sharp...
deepsubmergence.quest2dialogue0: Take it. More blueprints. Deeper... always deeper... ever deeper.
deepsubmergence.quest2dialogue1: They warned us, didn’t they? You know, you remember.
deepsubmergence.quest2dialogue2: Alone, down here. Alone. No one to watch, to track... to make sure... To check on.
deepsubmergence.quest2dialogue3: It was just a thought. A research grant, they said. Research. Endless hours... smearing... into forever.
deepsubmergence.quest2dialogue5: A fish with an battered mask. An explosive thing, stitched in agony. A crushing maw... shredding... tearing.
deepsubmergence.quest3dialogue0: Yes, yes, these. My children, almost perfect, almost ready for providence.
deepsubmergence.quest3dialogue1: Take these blueprints and dive, deeper. We're so close to touching it. Touching the abyss.
deepsubmergence.quest3dialogue2: The agency, said no, it's not there, it's not under, you CAN'T GO THERE!
deepsubmergence.quest3dialogue5: A bleached machine to cut and break through. Gnawing at the shell of reality.
deepsubmergence.questdonedialogue1: The corpse twitches and siezes, like machinery. Was it ever even alive?
